app_descript:
App Name: MetService NZ Weather

Brief: MetService NZ Weather is a comprehensive weather forecasting app specifically designed for New Zealand users. It offers a range of features that provide detailed weather information covering the next 48 hours to three days, ensuring that users are well-informed about the weather conditions in their area. The app includes severe weather alerts, real-time updates, and convenient widgets, aiding individuals to plan their days with confidence.

  • ğŸ’§ 3 Day Rain Forecast Maps: Plan ahead with forecast maps that predict rain patterns for the next three days.
